doc:
Beth Fowler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beth_Fowler 0 Beth Fowler (born November 1, 1940) is an American actress and singer, best known for her performances on Broadway and for her role as Sister Ingalls, on Orange Is The New Black. She is a two-time Tony Award nominee. Beth_Fowler ( born November_1_,_1940 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer , best_known for her_performances on Broadway and for her_role as Sister_Ingalls , on Orange Is The_New_Black . She is a_two-time_Tony_Award_nominee .
